SELECT TO_CHAR(b.dt, 'YYYY-MM') As MONTH, NVL(SUM(a.cnt), 0) qty , SUM(a.total) total FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(order_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS order_date , COUNT(*) cnt , SUM(order_pay) as total FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN TO_DATE('2021-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2021-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') GROUP BY to_char(order_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') ) a , ( SELECT TO_DATE('2021-01-01','YYYY-MM-DD') + LEVEL - 1 AS dt FROM dual
CONNECT BY LEVEL <= (TO_DATE('2021-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE('2021-01-01','YYYY-MM-DD') + 1) ) b
WHERE b.dt = a.order_date(+) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(b.dt, 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(b.dt, 'YYYY-MM')
